info.description: Remote Print Mode: Push your drawings!
info.title: Remote Print
info.detail: Allows properly configured remote applications to send graphics to RoboPaint

button.readytitle: Enable this when you're ready to start processing the print queue.
button.noresettitle: If enabled, readiness checkbox above will not be reset after a print, allows for immediate queue processing.

status.cancelled: Remote printing spooling and printing cancelled.
